description: [``botocore``] Introduced a new clientToken request parameter on CreateNetworkAcl and CreateRouteTable APIs. The clientToken parameter allows idempotent operations on the APIs.
[``botocore``] DeviceSerialNumber parameter is now optional in StartConnection API
[``botocore``] This release adds support for Aurora Limitless Database.
[``botocore``] Add DeprecationDate and SoftwareVersion to response of ListGateways.
